GeneralLedgerAccount.name: GeneralLedgerAccount

AccountingCode.description: The code that's used to organize information about the general ledger account.

AccountingName.description: The user-specified name for the general ledger account.

AccountingType.description: The accounting type for the general ledger account.

Description.description: Additional details about the general ledger account.

FinancialStatement.description: The financial statement that's created by using the information from the general ledger account.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LegalEntityId.description: The legal entity that's related to the general ledger account.

Name.description: An auto-generated name identifying the general ledger account, which is a combination of the accounting code and the account name.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this object or ID of the creator of this object.

Type.description: Specifies the accounting type for the general ledger account. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

GeneralLedgerAccount.accessRules: Revenue Cloud Billing license and the Accounts Receivables Admin permission set to access this object
